Excellent candidate with 'Actual' data type, high score, and in-table evidence. Maintains unit consistency. Critic confidence: 0.95. Verification confidence: 0.98. Time series flags: [Growth rate from 2020 is 35.6%, which is high but plausible given Ghana's economic situation.]
